text.text:
*✅ DASHBOARD FIX APPLIED*

The deployment issue has been resolved! The dashboard is now fully functional.

*🔧 What Was Fixed:*
• Corrected Firebase hosting configuration
• Deployed all 59 frontend files properly
• Fixed file path mapping issue

*🌐 Dashboard URLs:*
• Primary: https://duetright-dashboard.web.app
• Alternative: https://duetright-dashboard.firebaseapp.com

*🎯 Status:* Ready for employee access!
